status_message: Vice President Mike Pence and Second Lady Karen Pence spent time this Christmas season hosting members of the United States Armed Forces, the Secret Service, and their families at their home at the Naval Observatory to celebrate the holidays and thank them for their incredible service to the nation.
link_name: Christmas at the Naval Observatory | The White House
author: Donald Trump

status_message: After being the only state in the nation to lose population in the previous census, Michigan has seen six years of consecutive growth. Just last year, Michigan gained 28,866 new residents and more people moved to Michigan than moved out.  #ContinueTheComeback
author: Brian Calley

status_message: Learn about federal Real ID requirements & what you need to decide with regard to your Michigan driver's license/state ID.
author: Ruth Johnson

status_message: The Kent County Clerk / Register of Deeds offices will be closed on New Years Day, Monday, January 1st. We will re-open on Tuesday, January 2nd and look forward to serving you in 2018!.
author: Lisa Lyons
